headline: BRIEFING UPDATES AUTOMATICALLY EACH WEEKDAY MORNING
subheadline: Live market data powers this briefing daily via Barchart and Claude AI
lead: The AGSIST Daily Briefing is generated automatically each weekday morning from live Barchart futures data. Today's live briefing will appear here after the first GitHub Action run completes.
teaser: Add your GitHub secret ANTHROPIC_API_KEY to activate fully automated daily briefings.

one_number.context: Once ANTHROPIC_API_KEY is added to GitHub Secrets, this populates automatically every morning.

sections.title: How This Works
sections.body: Each weekday at 4:30am CT, a GitHub Action fetches overnight futures prices from Barchart, sends them to Claude, and commits the result here. The site reads this file on page load — no server required.

sections.title: What You Need
sections.body: In your GitHub repo, go to Settings → Secrets → Actions and add ANTHROPIC_API_KEY. BARCHART_API_KEY is already there from the price feed setup. Once both secrets exist, the next scheduled run will produce a real briefing.

sections.title: Manual Trigger
sections.body: You can also run it on demand: go to Actions → Daily Briefing → Run workflow. The briefing will be live within about 30 seconds of the Action completing.
